item.title: A Scalable Pipeline for Estimating Verb Frame Frequencies Using Large Language Models
item.description: arXiv:2507.22187v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present an automated pipeline for estimating Verb Frame Frequencies (VFFs), the frequency with which a verb appears in particular syntactic frames. VFFs provide a powerful window into syntax in both human and machine language systems, but existing ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> API, tool, arxiv, model, RAG | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
